modName: Aela The Seductress Sexy Replacer CBBE
summary: Aela is looking better than ever in this sexy replacement, and she even got some nice buffs to coincide with her stunning new appearance.
descriptionHtml:
This replacer gives Aela the ability to woop ass with increased damage, and help keep the baddies off of you by conjuring spirit wolf familiars.

Note: Read the recommended mod list below in order to get the best resemblance of the pictures above.

I changed her base armor, but I did place the ancient nord armor in her inventory. When you unlock her as a companion u can either take the armor for yourself, or she will auto-equip it by having you remove it and place it back in her inventory. 

Enjoy

Required Mods:
Calientes Female Body Mod Big Bottom Edition -CBBE- by Caliente
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2666//?

CHSBHC - BBP - Nude and Jiggly Mod by CherryHotaling !!Not sure if required!! (new to modding)
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/4888//?

Recommended Mods (to resemble photos):
ApachiiSkyHair by Apachii - Note: Get the optional files too.
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10168//?

CBBE skin texture V2 V3 plus Thepal and UNP compatible by navetsea
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6554//?

LiFE - Lith Face Enhancement -CBBE-UNP-UNPB by LithiumFlower
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/26354//?

Sporty Sexy Sweat - wet body skin texture - CBBE UNP UNPB ADEC Vanilla by Xs2reality
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/28946//?

Remodeled Armor for CBBE Bodyslide and BBP by ChronoTrigger77
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/25259/?tab=4&navtag=%2Fajax%2Fcomments%2F%3Fmod_id%3D25259%26page%3D1%26sort%3DDESC%26pid%3D0%26thread_id%3D802570&pUp=1
